title: The Jewel of Nineveh: A Craft of Shadows Book
description: A lone thief fleeing conflict is trapped in a city being torn apart by intrigue, and finds his talents gain him the unwelcome attention of vying factions. His endurance and cunning are tested to breaking point as he struggles to stay alive and the spectre of war descends. As the stakes grow higher than his own problems he faces a dilemma; can one man make a difference?  —“A richly woven Persian rug of a story”.
author: Diavosh Bassiti
